definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[קִצֵּץ]] Ps 129:4, ´[[וְק]]: consec. Ex 39:3, Ps 46:10, [[קִצַּץ]] 2Ki 18:16; Impf. [[וַיְקַצֵּץ]] 2Ki 16:17 + , etc.;-cut or hew off, thumbs, toes, Ju Jdg 1:6, hands and feet 2Sa 4:12; cut in two, spear ([[חֲנִית]]) Ps 46:10, threads Ex 39:3 (P), cords Ps 129:4 (fig.); cut in pieces, vessels (of gold) 2Ki 24:13, 2Ch 28:24; bases ([[הַמְּכׂנוֹת]]) 2Ki 16:17 (so Kit Benz, transposing [[הַמִּסְגְּרוֹת]]), doors 2Ki 18:16 (both, for the sake of metal sheathing).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[מְקֻצָּחִים]] Ju Jdg 1:7 hewn off (as v:Jdg 1:6 supr.).
